creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 32835
Replace numeric offsets with loop

Code in FastHttpDateFormat uses numeric offsets into an array when it should use a loop.

In this case the loop is no shorter than the existing 3 lines, but using a loop avoids the problem of ensuring that the array size and the max index agree.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: The formats field was unused, so the code is removed.
